title: january 28: leggo, lego
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks the founding, patenting, and journey of the Lego brand. She also talks about a fun recent release. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
